br.octahedron.cotopaxi.datastore.namespace
Interface NamespaceManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
AppEngineNamespaceManager
public interface NamespaceManager

A utility interface to deal with different data namespaces. Namespaces are used to implements logical data separation. It's very useful for multitenancy architectures.

Author:
VÃ­tor Avelino - vitoravelino@octahedron.com.br

Method Summary
 void changeToGlobalNamespace()
          Changes the current namespace to the global namespace.

Method Detail

changeToGlobalNamespace

void changeToGlobalNamespace()
Changes the current namespace to the global namespace.

changeToNamespace

void changeToNamespace(String namespace)
Changes the current namespace to the given one.

Parameters:
namespace - The namespace to be used.

changeToPreviousNamespace

void changeToPreviousNamespace()
Changes the current namespace to the previous one. If there's no previous namespace, the namespace isn't modified.

getNamespaces

List<String> getNamespaces()
Gets all existent namespace.

Returns:
A list with all existent namespaces.

exists

boolean exists(String namespace)
Checks if a given namespace exists.

Parameters:
namespace - The namespace to be checked.
Returns:
true if exists the given namespace, false if doesn't exists.
